hero.name: Sarah Rawlins
hero.heading: Hi! I’m Sarah
hero.description: I build modern, scalable, and growth-oriented websites and designs by combining clean aesthetics, quick performance, and conversion-focused UI/UX.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR WEB & UI/UX DESIGN PROJECTS
about.description: Hi, I’m Sarah Rawlins, a US-based Designer & Developer with 8 years of industry experience helping businesses build high-converting informational & e-commerce websites, powerful brand identities, and visually compelling digital assets. I specialize in WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Elementor, and custom component builds.

details.title: Scooter Mobile App UI/UX Design
details.description: FastGo Urban Mobility Case Study. A user-friendly mobile application design for urban scooter rentals, focusing on ease of use and quick booking flows.

details.title: Mobile App UX Design – GiveHub Donation Platform
details.description: A donation platform designed to streamlined the giving process for non-profits. Focused on trust, transparency, and ease of donation.

details.title: AgentFire – Real Estate Website Platform
details.description: Custom WordPress-Based Real Estate Website Platform. Built to help real estate agents generate leads and manage listings effectively.

details.title: Custom Shopify Store
details.description: A fully customized Shopify store with a unique theme and optimized conversion funnel.

allService.title: Web Design & Dev
allService.subTitle: WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Webflow, Custom Code (HTML, CSS, JS, PHP). Responsive & Speed Optimized.

allService.title: UI/UX Design
allService.subTitle: Figma, Adobe XD. User Interface, User Experience, Wireframes, Prototypes, Mobile App UI.

allService.title: Graphic Design
allService.subTitle: Logo Design, Brand Identity, Social Media Graphics, Marketing Collateral using Photoshop & Illustrator.

allService.title: Presentation Design
allService.subTitle: Investor Pitch Decks, Corporate Presentations, Slide Decks using PowerPoint & Google Slides.

allExperience.companyDescription: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design.
Helping businesses build high-converting websites, powerful brand identities, and visually compelling digital assets.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Sarah is a fantastic developer and designer! She understood our vision perfectly and delivered a site that exceeded our expectations.
Great communication and very professional. The UI/UX design she created for our app was top-notch.
Highly recommended for WordPress and Shopify projects. She knows her stuff and delivers on time.

sectionHeading.title: Let’s Discuss Your Project
sectionHeading.subTitle: Always available for freelancing if the right project comes along, Feel free to contact me.
